bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XVIII. France VI. Published by Hartmut Atsma, Robert Marichal, Pierre Gasnault and Jean Vezin.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XVIII, 659-669. - Paris, Bibliothèque Nationale; - Musée du Louvre; - Sorbonne, Institut de Papyrologie.

Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XVIII. France VI. Published by Hartmut Atsma, Robert Marichal, Pierre Gasnault and Jean Vezin.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1985, in fol., vii-108 pp., ill.
